subject: VAT Inquiry for Austria & Small Typo on Product Page
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I’m interested in purchasing the Plus X pedal set and would like to ask about VAT handling for deliveries to Austria. Is VAT already included at checkout, or will I need to pay it separately upon delivery? I’d appreciate some clarification to better understand the full cost before ordering.

Also, while browsing the product page, I noticed a small typo in Section 2 – Shipping Choices, in the table. The word "weight" appears to be misspelled as "weiht". Just wanted to bring this to your attention in case you’d like to correct it.

Thanks a lot for your help, and I’m looking forward to your response!

Best regards,
Diart Tahiri

conversations.body_text: Hi Diart Tahiri,    Thank you for pointing that out! We have made the correction. Plus X from Austria will be shipped from our warehouse in Germany, but only the silver version is currently available at the German warehouse.
No additional VAT tax is required. If shipping from China, there is a slight possibility that tax will be levied during customs clearance, but the probability is very low.

Hello Simsonn Team,

I'm planning to purchase the Plus X pedal set around mid-August, and I would really prefer the black version. Will your warehouse in Germany have it in stock by then, or should I expect it to ship from China instead?

Thanks in advance for the information!

Best regards,
Diart Tahiri
________________________________

Hello!
Just checking if my E-mail has been received.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Diart Tahiri,    There will be a batch of inventory replenishment to the German warehouse in early August, and there will be sufficient inventory in August, so please do not worry.
